description: The solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitations and requires a Pusher Furnace in accordance with Annex A.
full_summary:
## Government Tender Notice for Pusher Furnace

### Tender Details

*   **Reference Number:** WS3639695979-Doc3824379219
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3639695979
*   **Amendment Number:** 3
*   **Publication Date:** January 12, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** February 6, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EST
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

### Tender Description

A revision to the response deadline closing time has been made. Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bids by February 6, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EST to meet the requirements. The tender for a Pusher Furnace (Annex A) has superseded and canceled tender WS3639695979-Doc3824379219, previously announced on October 28, 2022, with a closing date of December 14, 2022, at 2:00 p.m. EST. 

Natural Resources Canada requires a Pusher Furnace, which will be used in accordance with the technical specifications outlined in Annex A. Suppliers must adhere to the conditions outlined in this notice to fulfill this requirement.

### Solicitation Details

*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and other international agreements (full list provided)

### Contact Information

*   **Name:** Erin O'Neill
*   **Email:** [erin.oneill@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:erin.oneill@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15114084?extsite=MTUxMTQwODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15114084?extsite=MTUxMTQwODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Delivery and Location
*   **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital
